name: TactiCube
description:
The kingdom is rapidly becoming urbanized and Queen Azanbo will not stop until there is not a single piece of nature left. You are the only one who can stop her, thanks to the magic of the dice you control. Travel to different parts of the kingdom and take back the power with the help of friends you make along the way!

An environment to use to your advantage

The dice you use have permanent effects on the terrain that will be useful in overcoming waves of enemies each turn.

Dice deckbuilding

Several dice will allow you to affect your opponents and the environment. Create, upgrade and merge your dice to customize your deck to your play style and maximize your chances of getting the best dice rolls.

A 3D battle zone

Each battle will take place on a cube so watch and analyze the situation well before acting because your enemy can easily take you by surprise from an opposite side!
